sentences.en: Loving , losing, hot touches, cold kisses, mystery, mistakes, leavings , takings, dreams, desires, laughter, lechery.
sentences.cn: 爱意,失败, 热情的触摸, 冷冷的吻, 神秘, 错误, 离开,索取, 梦想, 欲望, 大笑, 好色.

sentences.en: There was a hint of lechery in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他的眼神里带着一丝淫欲。

sentences.en: When they are idle, they indulge themselves into comfort , lechery, crapulence and gluttony.
sentences.cn: 他们闲散时, 就沉溺于安乐 、 纵欲、暴饮、暴食.

words.tran_cn: 好色的；淫荡的；引起淫欲的

trans.tran_en: sexual desire or pleasure that is considered bad because it is not part of a romantic relationship
